error-messages.no-answer-found: No answer could be loaded. Try again?

default-responses.initial-message: Hello, I am Coronabot. I answer questions about the number of cases of COVID-19 in Germany. \I am not an official source of information, but a demonstrator. The official German chatbot on COVID-19 is available at chatbot.it.bund.de. This demonstrator was developed at Anhalt University of Applied Sciences. More information on this regard is presented in the section.

credits.chatbot: This application has been developed by the Coronabot team. Its members are Johannes Richard Bartsch, Paul Heinze, Rostislav Iudin, Johannes Rudolf Herkner and Tim Schrader.
credits.project-supervision: The project was supervised by Aleksandr Perevalov and Andreas Both.
credits.frontend: The frontend has been developed by Jonas Wunsch.
